summary: Completed comprehensive testing of the contact form functionality. The main issue (undefined REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL causing 404 errors) has been successfully resolved. Contact form submission, success messaging, and form reset are all working correctly.

validation_bugs.issue: Backend accepts invalid form data (empty required fields, invalid email format)
validation_bugs.impact: Allows submission of incomplete/invalid contact forms to database
validation_bugs.details: API should validate required fields (name, email, message) and email format before accepting submissions

passed_tests: API health check - Backend accessible and responding
Contact form POST /api/contact - Successfully submits and returns proper response
Contact form GET /api/contact - Successfully retrieves submissions from database
Frontend form fields - All inputs (name, email, phone, message) work correctly
Form submission flow - Complete end-to-end submission process works
Success message display - Thank you message shows correctly after submission
Form reset functionality - 'Send Another Message' button resets form properly
Navigation elements - All header navigation links present and functional
CTA buttons - Hero section call-to-action buttons work correctly
Service and product cards - All UI components render properly
action_item_for_main_agent: Optional: Add server-side validation for contact form endpoint to reject submissions with empty required fields or invalid email formats. This is not critical as the main functionality works correctly.
